clinical_history: Urinary difficulty and suspected prostate enlargement.
findings: Common bile duct measures 25.24 mm, within normal limits.
No evidence of DVT; veins compressible with normal flow.
Placenta is enlarged and normally located.
Thyroid gland shows smooth-walled echotexture; no suspicious nodules.
Uterus appears coarse; endometrial thickness measures 22.66 mm.
Prostate is unremarkable; volume approximately 32.48 cc.
Testes are coarse with normal vascularity.
